instructions.name: activate_game
docs: Activate a created game (settlement program only)

accounts.name: game_keeper_signer
docs: Game keeper's signing PDA for CPI calls to rando program

accounts.name: gk_global_config
docs: Global config to validate settlement program authorization

instructions.name: add_authorized_program
docs: Add an authorized game program (admin only)

instructions.name: cancel_bet
docs: Cancel a bet with validation from game contract

accounts.name: token_pool
docs: Liquidity pool account (optional, for exposure updates)

accounts.name: pool_exposure
docs: Pool exposure account (optional, for exposure updates)

accounts.name: liquidity_pool_program
docs: Liquidity pool program (optional, for exposure updates)

accounts.name: authorized_programs
docs: Authorized programs account for accessing liquidity pool program

accounts.name: bet_tracker
docs: Game bet tracker for updating volume and EV tracking

instructions.name: cancel_game
docs: Cancel a game with refunds (settlement program only)

instructions.name: claim_payout
docs: Claim a payout from a settled game (anyone can trigger)

accounts.name: game_settlement
docs: Game settlement account containing payout data

accounts.name: escrow_vault
docs: Escrow vault holding the funds to be claimed

accounts.name: winner_token_account
docs: Winner's token account to receive the payout

accounts.name: claimer
docs: Anyone can trigger claims (no authority check needed)

instructions.name: close_betting
docs: Close betting for a game (publicly callable)

accounts.name: authorized_programs
docs: Authorized programs account for accessing liquidity pool program

accounts.name: bet_tracker
docs: Game bet tracker for updating final exposure

accounts.name: game_program
docs: Generic game program for closing betting

accounts.name: game_account
docs: Generic game account for closing betting

accounts.name: lp_program_config
docs: Program config account for liquidity pool

accounts.name: token_pool
docs: Liquidity pool account for exposure updates

accounts.name: pool_exposure
docs: Pool exposure account for exposure updates

accounts.name: lp_global_config
docs: Global config account for liquidity pool

accounts.name: liquidity_pool_program
docs: Liquidity pool program for exposure updates

accounts.name: game_program_account
docs: Game program to create the game in

accounts.name: game_account
docs: Game account to be created by the game program
The address is derived from creator and game counter seeds and validated by the game program.

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global config for the game program
The address is derived from standard seeds and validated by the game program during the create_game_internal CPI call.

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint that will be used for this game

accounts.name: game_settlement
docs: Game settlement account (must be resetable for reuse if it exists)

instructions.name: get_payouts
docs: Get payouts for a game (off-chain queryable)

accounts.name: game_registry
docs: Game registry to check game state

accounts.name: game_settlement
docs: Game settlement account (optional - only exists if game is settled)

instructions.name: initialize_authorized_programs
docs: Initialize the authorized programs list (admin only, one-time)

instructions.name: place_bet
docs: Place a bet by escrowing funds and validating with game contract

accounts.name: authorized_programs
docs: Authorized programs account for accessing EV fee config

accounts.name: bet_tracker
docs: Game bet tracker for cumulative volume and EV tracking

instructions.name: remove_authorized_program
docs: Remove an authorized game program (admin only)

instructions.name: settle_game
docs: Settle a completed game by distributing payouts

accounts.name: game_keeper_signer
docs: Game keeper's signing PDA for CPI calls to rando program

instructions.name: update_admin
docs: Update the admin authority (current admin only)

instructions.name: update_liquidity_pool_program
docs: Update liquidity pool program ID (admin only)

errors.name: GamePlaceBetCpiFailed
errors.msg: Game program place bet CPI failed

errors.name: GameCancelBetCpiFailed
errors.msg: Game program cancel bet CPI failed

errors.name: GameSettleGameCpiFailed
errors.msg: Game program settle game CPI failed

errors.name: GameActivateGameCpiFailed
errors.msg: Game program activate game CPI failed

errors.name: GameProgramNotAuthorized
errors.msg: Game program not authorized for settlement

errors.name: CannotSettle
errors.msg: Cannot settle game in current state

errors.name: SettlementAuthorityNotRecognized
errors.msg: Settlement authority not recognized by flip program

errors.name: InvalidOddsData
errors.msg: Invalid odds data from game program

errors.name: NotEnoughOptionalAccounts
errors.msg: Not enough optional accounts provided for settlement.

errors.name: InvalidLpGlobalConfig
errors.msg: Invalid liquidity pool global config account

errors.name: InvalidLpProgramConfig
errors.msg: Invalid liquidity pool program config account

errors.name: NoAffiliateForFeeAccount
errors.msg: No affiliate specified for fee account

errors.name: GameAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Game already exists with this ID

errors.name: CannotResetSettlement
errors.msg: Settlement account cannot be reset in current state

errors.name: InsufficientAccountSpace
errors.msg: Insufficient account space for settlement data

errors.name: GameSettlementNotResetable
errors.msg: Game settlement must have all payouts claimed before reuse

fields.name: programs
docs: List of authorized game program IDs

fields.name: admin
docs: Admin authority who can modify the list

fields.name: ev_fee_config
docs: EV-based fee configuration for new system

fields.name: odds_factor
docs: The divisor for EV calculation (e.g., 2.0 for coin flip. 0.0 implies PvP game where house

fields.name: bet_type
docs: Description of bet type for logging

fields.name: ev_fee_bps
docs: Total fee taken from a given game payout as percentage of user bet size

fields.name: protocol_fee_ev_bps
docs: Protocol fee as percentage of EV (basis points, e.g., 500 = 5% of EV)

fields.name: operator_fee_ev_bps
docs: Operator fee as percentage of EV (basis points, e.g., 2500 = 25% of EV)

fields.name: affiliate_fee_ev_bps
docs: Affiliate fee as percentage of EV (basis points, e.g., 2000 = 20% of EV)

fields.name: game_id
docs: Game ID this tracker belongs to

fields.name: global_count
docs: Global count from game registry (for detecting reused games)

fields.name: total_volume
docs: Total capital currently in escrow for this game

fields.name: total_ev
docs: Cumulative expected value of all bets placed (for fee calculation)

fields.name: total_fees
docs: Net fee amount to allow the given EV above. Fees = ev * odds_factor

fields.name: total_exposure
docs: Total exposure for this game (sum of all exposure deltas)

fields.name: settlement_program
docs: The settlement program that created this game

fields.name: house_nonce_commitment
docs: House nonce commitment (hash of actual nonce)

fields.name: house_nonce_revealed
docs: Whether house nonce has been revealed

fields.name: final_randomness
docs: Final randomness result (copied from global entropy after reveal)

fields.name: entropy_nonce
docs: Anti-replay nonce (increments with each entropy addition)

fields.name: sealed_randomness_height
docs: Randomness chain height when game was sealed (locked)

fields.name: game_program
docs: Game program that handles this game

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator who created the game (pays for account creation)

fields.name: operator
docs: Operator who can activate the game

fields.name: game_config_data
docs: Opaque game configuration data (interpreted by game program)

fields.name: game_id
docs: Game ID this settlement belongs to

fields.name: payouts
docs: All payout entries from the game settlement

fields.name: claimed_bitmap
docs: Bitmap tracking which payouts have been claimed (payout index -> claimed)

fields.name: authorized_settlements
docs: List of authorized settlement program IDs

fields.name: token_mint
docs: The token mint for this pool

fields.name: vault
docs: The vault token account holding pool funds

fields.name: lp_token_mint
docs: The LP token mint for this pool

fields.name: current_exposure
docs: Current total exposure across all active games

fields.name: total_exposure_settled
docs: Total exposure that has been settled (for withdrawal queue)

fields.name: total_queued_deposits
docs: Total amount of queued deposits (not yet converted to LP tokens)

fields.name: pool
docs: The liquidity pool this exposure tracking belongs to

fields.name: total_exposure
docs: Total current exposure across all games

fields.name: active_queue
docs: Active entropy queue (processed in current block)

fields.name: pending_queue
docs: Pending entropy queue (will become active in next block)

fields.name: total_steps
docs: Total steps executed across all blocks

fields.name: last_tick_slot
docs: Last slot when tick was called (for block transition detection)

fields.name: trusted_providers
docs: List of trusted entropy providers (migrated from GlobalEntropy)

fields.name: authorized_readers
docs: List of authorized readers (migrated from GlobalEntropy)

fields.name: mining_difficulty
docs: Mining difficulty parameter for randomness chain

fields.name: randomness_chain_height
docs: Current height of the randomness chain (publicly readable)

fields.name: randomness_chain_buffer
docs: Circular buffer storing recent mined randomness values

fields.name: randomness_chain_head
docs: Current tip/head of the randomness chain

fields.name: nonce
docs: Incrementing nonce included in all head updates
